conbody.p: Name of the operation and processing software integrated for this system: uExceed, software version: R00x. uExceed is a public software platform system for medical imaging and can be applied to the management and analysis of medical imaging data. In addition, it supports different imaging devices. It has the functions of patient registration, information management, image viewing, image analysis and processing, measurement and film typesetting and filming, helping doctors to analyze, process and archive the exam result. The uExceed system is used to acquire and process medical images in compliance with DICOM standards by applying medical imaging technologies and computer software/hardware technologies, thus providing a basis for image diagnosis or scientific researches, and serving as an auxiliary tool for the physicians of Imaging Department during their diagnosis.

Main interfaces of the operation and processing software include the Patient tab, main operation areas, system control area, system tools, system status bar and other areas. Please refer to "Main interface distribution" on page 3-3 for detailed introduction.

For all functions of this system, such as distributions and function overview of the Patient Registration interface, the Patient Administration interface, the Exam interface, the Viewing interface and the Filming interface, please refer to "Configuration performance" on page 3-19 .
For the performance parameters, recommended configurations and other information of this system, please refer to "Configuration performance" on page 3-19 .
